{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=PTV1000 |revision=-100NAS |asin=B0033WWAF0 |price=120 |est_release_date=01/2010 |fcc_date=12/30/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=computer screen streamer |fcc_id=PY309400123 |ic_id=4054A-09400123 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Sigma Designs |cpu1_model=SMP8653A |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=NAND512W3A2CN6 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T51163QG-HCE6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, J15 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 4-pin header,, populated,, CON28 |wi1_module=Netgear PTV1000 Wireless Module |wi1_module_if=USB 2.0 |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3070 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |addl_chips=3.3V 24-bit Stereo DAC;Asahi Kasei;AK4421A;;1; ,,, HDMI Transmitter PHY;Silicon Image;Sil9002CSU;;1; ,,, Low Drop Positive Voltage Regulator;STMicroelectronics;LD1117;;2; ,,, 3A, 23V, 340KHz Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP2307DN;;1; |flags=HDMI out |stock_boot=ZBoot;3.1.0; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.22.19; |802dot11_protocols=bgn |oui=00:26:F2 }} {{TagLine|Push2TV TV Adapter for Intel Wireless Display}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=PTV1000|vs_id=18162}}
"WIDI", "REV: 1.03", and "PCB_MADE_IN_CHINA" silkscreened on the main board. :"PEGATRON" and "PCB MADE IN CHINA" is silkscreened on the wireless module.
